name: Notion Shaan's LIFE Dashboard
description: Track your goals like a big boyIf you're familiar with the My First Million podcast, you may have heard about Shaan's Life Dashboard and his ab → z framework. It's a simple system that allows you to review each quarter how well you did on five key themes (in his case: health, work, play, love, self-respect) and plan your goals.This free Notion template helps you do all of that easily, and provides you with the first step you need to start taking big actions.Features Goals tracker "Life" tracker
features: Goals tracker; "Life" tracker; ab → z framework
